alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 8:30AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Precipitation Moving Out... .As wintry precipitation has started to clear across some portions of the area, reports of 8 to 12 inches of snow and a 1/4 inch of ice have been received. This wintry mix of snow and freezing drizzle will continue to move northeast out of the local area late this morning. Winds will continue to drift snow, especially on ridge tops, higher terrain and open areas. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow with additional accumulations up to 1 inch. Brief period of a wintry mix with light icing possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
